dcterms:creator: Sebastian Arnold
Rudolf Schneider
Philippe Cudré-Mauroux
Felix A. Gers

dcterms:description: A large subset of full-text Wikipedia articles about diseases, labeled with entity identifiers, section headlines and 27 normalized aspect classes.
dcterms:title: WikiSectionQA

dcterms:creator: Asma Ben Abacha
Dina Demner-Fushman
dcterms:description: A collection of medical question-answer pairs from multiple trusted sources of the National Institutes of Health (NIH), annotated with structured identifiers for entities and aspects.
dcterms:title: MedQuAD

dcterms:creator: Ming Zhu
Aman Ahuja
Wei Wei
Chandan K. Reddy
dcterms:description: A collection of consumer health question-answer pairs crawled from the website Patient, with passages generated from sections in the documents and annotated by human labelers.
dcterms:title: HealthQA
